mapper.select: select id , plugin_name , zk_id , msg_sender , mail_sender , phone_number , email_address , args , commit from mario_plugin_info where id = #{id}
select id , plugin_name , zk_id , msg_sender , mail_sender , phone_number , email_address , args , commit from mario_plugin_info order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into mario_plugin_info ( id , plugin_name , zk_id , msg_sender , mail_sender , phone_number , email_address , args , commit ) values ( #{id} , #{plugin_name} , #{zk_id} , #{msg_sender} , #{mail_sender} , #{phone_number} , #{email_address} , #{args} , #{commit} )
mapper.update: update mario_plugin_info set id = #{id} , plugin_name = #{plugin_name} , zk_id = #{zk_id} , msg_sender = #{msg_sender} , mail_sender = #{mail_sender} , phone_number = #{phone_number} , email_address = #{email_address} , args = #{args} , commit = #{commit} where id = #{id}
